00079 bool App::key(SDL_Event event) {
00080     printf("I got a %d that is a/an %c\r\n", event.key.keysym.sym, event.key.keysym.sym);
00081     switch (event.key.keysym.sym) {
00082         case SDLK_LEFT:
00083             App::getInstance()->character->moveLeft(event.type == SDL_KEYDOWN);
00084             break;
00085         case SDLK_RIGHT:
00086             App::getInstance()->character->moveRight(event.type == SDL_KEYDOWN);
00087             break;
00088         default:
00089             break;
00090     }
00091     return true;
00092 }
